discussion.comment:
Indeed @gares that should be set, a direct link to the archives was missing for google to pick them up, as robots.txt still forbids accesing the mailing list information page.

Now that I think of it, @amahboubi , it could make sense to request the INRIA ops to allow access to the info page too. Now if you google "ssreflect mailing list" you'll go directly to the archives.

[Generally the whole Disallow: / of sympa's robots seems a bit strange IMVVHO]
